languages.text: "Не злись, Соломон. Префект начала давить, и я сказал{mf||а} первое, что пришло в голову".
"Do not be so angry, Solomorne. The prefect started pressuring me, so I said the first thing that came to my mind."
languages.original_text: "Не злись, Соломон. Префект начала давить, и я сказал{mf||а} первое, что пришло в голову".

traits.locale_text: "Do not be so angry, Solomorne. The prefect started pressuring me, so I said the first thing that came to my mind."
"Do not be so angry, Solomorne. The prefect started pressuring me, so I said the first thing that came to my mind."
"Do not be so angry, Solomorne. The prefect started pressuring me, so I said the first thing that came to my mind."
"Do not be so angry, Solomorne. The prefect started pressuring me, so I said the first thing that came to my mind."
"Do not be so angry, Solomorne. The prefect started pressuring me, so I said the first thing that came to my mind."
"Do not be so angry, Solomorne. The prefect started pressuring me, so I said the first thing that came to my mind."

languages.text: 「そんなに怒るなよ、ソロモーン。総監に強く詰め寄られて、とっさに思いついたことを口にしただけなんだ」
languages.original_text: "Do not be so angry, Solomorne. The prefect started pressuring me, so I said the first thing that came to my mind."

traits.locale_text: 「そんなに怒るなよ、ソロモーン。総監に強く詰め寄られて、とっさに思いついたことを口にしただけなんだ」

languages.text: "Seid nicht so wütend, Solomorne. Die Präfektin hat mich unter Druck gesetzt, also habe ich das Erste gesagt, was mir eingefallen ist."
languages.original_text: "Do not be so angry, Solomorne. The prefect started pressuring me, so I said the first thing that came to my mind."

traits.locale_text: "Seid nicht so wütend, Solomorne. Die Präfektin hat mich unter Druck gesetzt, also habe ich das Erste gesagt, was mir eingefallen ist."

languages.text: « Ne soyez pas fâché, Solomorne. J'ai cédé à la pression de la préfète et j'ai dit la première chose qui m'est venue à l'esprit. »
languages.original_text: "Do not be so angry, Solomorne. The prefect started pressuring me, so I said the first thing that came to my mind."

traits.locale_text: « Ne soyez pas fâché, Solomorne. J'ai cédé à la pression de la préfète et j'ai dit la première chose qui m'est venue à l'esprit. »

languages.text: «No se irrite tanto, Solomorne. La prefecta me estaba presionando, así que le dije lo primero que se me pasó por la cabeza».
languages.original_text: "Do not be so angry, Solomorne. The prefect started pressuring me, so I said the first thing that came to my mind."

traits.locale_text: «No se irrite tanto, Solomorne. La prefecta me estaba presionando, así que le dije lo primero que se me pasó por la cabeza».

languages.text: “别这么生气，索罗蒙。那个行政官当时在向我施压，我只是想到什么就说什么。”
languages.original_text: "Do not be so angry, Solomorne. The prefect started pressuring me, so I said the first thing that came to my mind."

traits.locale_text: “别这么生气，索罗蒙。那个行政官当时在向我施压，我只是想到什么就说什么。”

languages.text: "Bu kadar kızmana gerek yok Solomorne. Prefekt beni sıkıştırmaya başladı. Ben de aklıma ilk geleni söyledim."
languages.original_text: "Do not be so angry, Solomorne. The prefect started pressuring me, so I said the first thing that came to my mind."

traits.locale_text: "Bu kadar kızmana gerek yok Solomorne. Prefekt beni sıkıştırmaya başladı. Ben de aklıma ilk geleni söyledim."
